column2: A futa (short for futanari) is a woman that sports both a vagina and a penis (may or may not include testicles). In Luxuria, they can impregnate other women as well as get pregnant themselves.\nMasculine and feminine are- using a modern term- transgender traits, men or women who choose to look and act as a gender they weren't born as. In Luxuria, their racial gender portraits will be flipped (men will have women portraits, and vice versa).
I want to be a futa.
I want to be a masculine futa.
